Job title:
Principal test engineer
Description:
Technologist, Test Engineering for enterprise NVMe SSD product, representing all aspects of the firmware validation function; including requirement & acceptance criteria definitions, test design and development, test execution and reporting, root cause failure analysis and program risk assessments.

1.         work with the product/project managers to define, verify test requirements and acceptance criteria.
2.         Provide mentoring and technical direction to the team as well as influence test strategy and test architecture decisions.

4.         Define, configure, maintain, and optimize storage test system solutions.
5.         Developing automated testing procedures and infrastructure to improve coverage and efficiency.
6.         Creating test plans and strategies to improve firmware quality and test coverage.

1.         At least 8 years or equivalent experience in embedded firmware testing, with multiple successful products that entered mass production.
2.         Deep knowledge in storage domain, expertise in storage protocols such as SATA, SAS, NVMe, Flash Memory .
3.         Expertise in best in automation methodologies for firmware test.
4.         Knowledge of black, white, grey box testing methodologies as they apply to storage devices (SSD preferred).
5.         Strong programming/scripting skills for testing storage devices (Python). Extensive hands-on experience with functional and regression testing of products embedded software (firmware).
6.         Failure analysis expertise.
